hero.title: Supercharged web development!
hero.subtitle: Unleashing the Power of the Web: Combines Astro, Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js to Streamline Your Web Development Process.
hero.globe_title: Craft Stunning, High-Performance Websites with Ease and Speed

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: All the tools you need
features.description: Astro is a high-performance static site builder that seamlessly integrates with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js. It allows you to build websites with ease and speed, without sacrificing on performance.
